Articles.Content: Will Ksp2 have the easter eggs from ksp 1 still in it? I'm a little curious.
probably some refferences to them but not in the same place probably

Every developer who loves his game will do such a thing. There is no doubt we have such developers there. So that's just a matter of amount. The new project should not be full of references, easter eggs, and retrospectives in general, but why we would not have some nostalgic stuff? I feel that we definitely will have some.

I’d expect to see at least some of the original anomalies- the monolith near KSC, maybe a Mun arch or the Duna “face”, but probably not all of them; I’d be pretty surprised if the 10th anniversary anomalies that were added in 1.12 appeared in KSP2, as well as things like the Kerbin and Mun UFOs, the Duna pyramid and its SSTV signal or the dead Kraken on Bop. There will probably be new anomalies to find in the new solar system(s) too, but what they’ll be is anyone’s guess.
Thanks everyone for your answers, I really appreciate them!
